_sText:
This is another "bkh" map that I made and run on my server.  I use it for GG/DM but I also included buy zones so it can be use as a non GG map.  

----------------------------------------

This map includes two bottle neck tunnels in the center with a red smoke screen in the center of each tunnel so obscure the opponents and includes a whoosh sound when entering the smoke.  I also included several optimizing tools such as Tools/Hint, Tools/Skip, Tools/Nodraw, Tools/Block Light  and Tools/Occulder.  
There is also many displacements used for the columns and curved objects.  A Nav file is included.  This map has 42 spawn points, 21 on each side.  It is not a random spawn map. 

----------------------------------------

NOTE:
I play this map on my server but there has been a couple players that claim they see purple where the blue should be.  I'm not sure why this is.  Ive only had this complaint from 2 players.  Everyone else sees  it just the way it looks in the screen shots.  So if anyone know why this might be happening please pass it on to me.  I personally believe its their video card but I just wanted to let people know.

----------------------------------------

UPDATE

The blue texture has been changed/fixed due to some players could not DL the texture.

----------------------------------------
  

I'm open to all constructive criticism and any suggestions to make this a better map.
